title: [Gameplay] Cassiopeia W Indicator Bug
body:
When I am casting W, the Indicator remains at max Range, no matter if I move the mouse closer to Cassiopeia to reduce the Range or not.

In contrast to the Indicator showing that W will hit at max range it is casted properly closer to Cassio.

Very confusing, please look into D:

replies.body: Hey There! Unfortunately we did not get time to implement the tech to make this indicator work as intended for 6.9. The issue will be resolved with 6.10.
Last time I tried Cassiopeia, which was around Wednesday of last week on the pbe, the problem was there. Was 7 days not enough time to fix it? o_O

> [{quoted}](name=Frozen Sovereign,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=EsZuM84d,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-04T18:45:16.399+0000)
>
> Last time I tried Cassiopeia, which was around Wednesday of last week on the pbe, the problem was there. Was 7 days not enough time to fix it? o_O

Keep in mind there was a LOT of stuff they had to get done to send this patch live. The art assets for a range indicator are pretty expensive and unimportant compared to the rest of like a dozen small-scope reworks.

Thank you for posting this. I tried Cassiopeia today and struggled with her W all game, since the position indicator doesn't match the behavior of the skill.

I also kept trying to spray it through the terrain, unsuccessfully. :D
